name: Cult of Doom
description:
How to play:

You are the Messiah of our Lord and Only God  : CTHULHU . User the mouse to transmit the Cult of DOOM and get the entire CITY.

        

TEAM

Programmer - Guelmi Gomez

Vfx artist - Paula Chicote

2D artist & animator - Javier G Merida

Musician - Rafael Carrion

Remember: Use Ctrl+ F to fullscreen!! (Text only in spanish sorry D:)
